#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define MAX 1000005
using namespace std;
int arr[MAX];
int main()
{
	int i, j;
	for(i=0;i<MAX;i++)
	   arr[i] = 0;
	arr[1]=1;  arr[2]=1;
	for(i=3;i<MAX;i++)
	  {
	  	  if(i&1)
	  	    arr[i] = arr[i-1]+1;
	  	  else
	  	    arr[i] = arr[i/2];
	  }
	  int x, y, mx = -999;
	  scanf("%d%d", &x, &y);
	  for(i=x;i<=y;i++)
	   if(arr[i]> mx)
	      mx = arr[i];
	 printf("%d\n", mx);
}
